div.p: Just a quick thanks to all who attended the 2010 MarkLogic User's Conference. I had a great time getting to know more of the MarkLogic community.

ul.li: Watching Mike Breevort win DemoJam even with a 500 error in his demo!
Seeing Chris Biow's session on the Universal index - I'm looking forward to the slides coming out soon.
Hearing about Holten Norris' UI work on flexible, dynamic menus
Eating sushi while looking at cool fish in the Steinharte Aquarium
Meeting up with User Group leaders, Marie Lichte (MUGFR) and Mike Fagan (DenMark) and hearing about even more interest in user groups.

div.p: Looking forward to next year's meeting already!
